rows.label: soul08_P0101
rows.name: Everyone with me! Melee!

rows.label: soul08_P0102
rows.name:
I'm moving in close.
 Help me out!

rows.label: soul08_P0103
rows.name:
Hit them again up close for
 a boost of adrenaline!

rows.label: soul08_P0201
rows.name:
No need to get too close.
 Attack at range!

rows.label: soul08_P0202
rows.name:
I'm going in guns blazing!
 Buff us up!

rows.label: soul08_P0203
rows.name:
Let's fight from a distance!
 Weaken them first!

rows.label: soul08_P0301
rows.name:
No messing around.
 Move in close!

rows.label: soul08_P0302
rows.name: The battle is on! Cover fire!

rows.label: soul08_P0303
rows.name: Ready? Use your auras!

rows.label: soul08_P0401
rows.name: This is bad. I need healing!

rows.label: soul08_P0402
rows.name:
Not good! I could use some
 help!

rows.label: soul08_P0403
rows.name:
I'm just getting warmed up.
 Give me some power!

rows.label: soul08_P0501
rows.name:
I'm not ready to die yet!
 Heal me!

rows.label: soul08_P0502
rows.name:
I have to keep going.
 Help me recover!

rows.label: soul08_P0503
rows.name:
There's still hope.
 Buff us up and fight!

rows.label: soul08_P0601
rows.name:
It's now or never...
 Close in and strike...

rows.label: soul08_P0602
rows.name:
It's up to you now...
 Blast those sons of...

rows.label: soul08_P0603
rows.name:
Forget about me... Turn this
 around with an aura!

rows.label: soul08_P0701
rows.name:
They felt THAT!
 Now strike them again!

rows.label: soul08_P0702
rows.name: Yes! Fire away! Don't let up!

rows.label: soul08_P0703
rows.name: Yeah! Now let's cripple them!

rows.label: soul08_P0801
rows.name:
Woohoo! Melee attacks!
 Go go go!

rows.label: soul08_P0802
rows.name:
Got it! Now take the shot
 and topple them!

rows.label: soul08_P0803
rows.name:
Destroyed! Now weaken
 the enemy!

rows.label: soul08_P0901
rows.name:
It's working...
 Let that behemoth have it!

rows.label: soul08_P0902
rows.name:
They're slowing down...
 Time to make us unstoppable!

rows.label: soul08_P0903
rows.name:
We've got them where we
 want them. Now, Overclock!

rows.label: soul08_P1001
rows.name:
That did the trick.
 Now close in and clean up!

rows.label: soul08_P1002
rows.name:
Easy! Now pump them
 with lead!

rows.label: soul08_P1003
rows.name:
Okay, cripple them next!
 Make it count!

rows.label: soul08_P1101
rows.name:
Now's a good time
 to use an aura!

rows.label: soul08_P1102
rows.name:
Aura! You need to mix up
 your strategy!

rows.label: soul08_P1103
rows.name:
Buff us up! We need
 some adrenaline!

rows.label: soul08_P1201
rows.name: I'm cleaning up! Help me out!

rows.label: soul08_P1202
rows.name:
No one can stop us now.
 Overclock!

rows.label: soul08_P1203
rows.name:
Use an aura!
 Gain the advantage!

rows.label: soul08_C0101
rows.name:
So long! Who wants
 the next dance?

rows.label: soul08_C0102
rows.name:
One down! Scatter the rest
 from a distance!

rows.label: soul08_C0103
rows.name:
We're not done yet!
 Keep the buffs coming!

rows.label: soul08_C0201
rows.name:
Ha! Not even close!
 Aura, aura!

rows.label: soul08_C0202
rows.name: Oh please. Buff us up!

rows.label: soul08_C0203
rows.name: Yeah, I'm on fire! Blast them!

rows.label: soul08_C0301
rows.name:
Now! Hit 'em like
 you mean it!

rows.label: soul08_C0302
rows.name: Guns ready! I see a window!

rows.label: soul08_C0303
rows.name:
Nice, very nice! Now move in!
 No mercy!

rows.label: soul08_C0401
rows.name:
Oh great. Buff us up so
 we're ready!

rows.label: soul08_C0402
rows.name:
This doesn't bode well.
 Counter with an aura!

rows.label: soul08_C0403
rows.name:
Cripple them! Let THEM
 deal with this weather!

rows.label: soul08_C0501
rows.name:
Why am I running so much?!
 We should buff up!

rows.label: soul08_C0502
rows.name:
Can't catch me!
 How about a buff?

rows.label: soul08_C0503
rows.name:
Let's shake things up!
 Use your Overclock!

rows.label: soul08_C0601
rows.name:
Cheers, mate.
 Let's kick 'em around a little!

rows.label: soul08_C0602
rows.name:
Right in the nick of time.
 Ranged attacks next!

rows.label: soul08_C0603
rows.name:
Thanks, I mean it.
 Hey, get yourself an aura!

rows.label: soul08_C0701
rows.name:
You're doing great out there.
 Let's add some buffs.

rows.label: soul08_C0702
rows.name:
Thank you.
 How about a buff?

rows.label: soul08_C0703
rows.name:
Cheers! But what we
 really need now is an aura!

rows.label: soul08_C0801
rows.name:
No falling back!
 Move in and strike!

rows.label: soul08_C0802
rows.name:
It's kill or be killed!
 Concentrate your fire!

rows.label: soul08_C0803
rows.name:
I'm going on the attack!
 Get me ready!

rows.label: soul08_C0901
rows.name:
I've got the height advantage!
 Blast away!

rows.label: soul08_C0902
rows.name:
Fire! I'll hold them down
 from above!

rows.label: soul08_C0903
rows.name:
Height is might! Let's punch
 some holes in them!

rows.label: soul08_C1001
rows.name:
Someone took a spill!
 Kick them while they're down!

rows.label: soul08_C1002
rows.name: Shoot now! Overwhelm them!

rows.label: soul08_C1003
rows.name: They're down! Weaken them!

rows.label: soul08_C1101
rows.name:
That put a stop to them.
 Close in!

rows.label: soul08_C1102
rows.name:
They're stunned!
 Take aim and clean up!

rows.label: soul08_C1103
rows.name:
Weaken them now while
 they're not moving!

rows.label: soul08_C1201
rows.name:
If they like sleeping that much,
 move in and make it permanent!

rows.label: soul08_C1202
rows.name:
Don't expect us to stop shooting
 just because you want a nap!

rows.label: soul08_C1203
rows.name:
Go ahead and count sheep
 while we butcher you!

rows.label: soul08_C1301
rows.name:
I'll hold them!
 You rough them up!

rows.label: soul08_C1302
rows.name:
Shoot now while I've
 got them restrained!

rows.label: soul08_C1303
rows.name:
Nabbed one!
 Step in and strike!

rows.label: soul08_C1401
rows.name: Damn! Patch me up!

rows.label: soul08_C1402
rows.name:
I'll be okay. Move in and
 return the favor!

rows.label: soul08_C1403
rows.name: Enough is enough! Cover fire!

rows.label: soul08_C1501
rows.name:
Let's heal up first,
 then counter!

rows.label: soul08_C1502
rows.name:
Bloody hell... We'll need more
 power to turn this around!

rows.label: soul08_C1503
rows.name:
I can still fight. Use your
 Overclock and give me a chance!

rows.label: soul08_C1601
rows.name: Fuel's almost out! I need a refill!

rows.label: soul08_C1602
rows.name:
My tank's almost empty!
 I need a fix!

rows.label: soul08_C1603
rows.name:
I don't have enough fuel!
 Help me out!
